entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
